title: 転んで、返って、待ちかねて

text_block_list.text: With the Japan Cup approaching, Matikanetannhauser's spirit and condition are fully prepared. The public is also excitedly anticipating her performance, creating a huge buzz! And then, on the day of the race—
Word comes in that she collapsed with a nosebleed and was taken to the hospital.
The diagnosis says it's not serious, but she can't race today. Matikanetannhauser puts on a brave face, but gradually, tears of frustration begin to well up.
Amidst this... her friends come to cheer her up. They tell her, who missed a perfect chance to become the 'protagonist,' to look ahead—there will be another opportunity.
These were the very words she had spoken countless times before, encouraging others. Rising again, she sets her sights on the Arima Kinen, determined to make it happen next time!
